original_definition: 'retained waste' means waste, generated from processing or from an operational accident, measured or estimated on the basis of measurements, which has been transferred to a specific location within the material balance area from which it can be retrieved;
generated_definition: 'retained waste' means material that has been previously declared as waste and has not been treated or disposed of in accordance with the relevant waste management regulations.

Article 2: ‘retained waste’ means waste, generated from processing or from an operational accident, measured or estimated on the basis of measurements, which has been transferred to a specific location within the material balance area from which it can be retrieved;
